column4: Hey, i just downloaded an icon theme and im a linux noob, how do i install
open up the "themes" dialogue in the "Preferences" sub of the "System" menu, then drag the icon pack's file into that window
do i have to extracct them
i get an error when doing that
o i forgot to do that
what is the directory to sources.list
cant i remove the # feom the beginning of #deb and add multiverse after every line that ends with universe
You need to have root priveledges. Try his command: "gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list"
i know, thanbks, ive done this once today on my other comp
ok i did that, now what
i still got that same error but it still is updating
